price: 19. En wees niet zoals degenen die Allah vergaten waarna Hij hen zichzelf liet vergeten. Dat zijn de verdorvenen.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna nasū al-laha fa-ansāhum anfusahum ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
